title: Le Francais par le film. No. 02
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/France - Social life and customs
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Language and culture
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Language and culture
Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Languages, Modern - Study and teaching

Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Foreign language films
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Speech
description: Comprises twelve graduated lessons, each of which introduces a typical scene of French life and customs and stresses some part of French grammar. This episode centres around the tea table and a railway station with emphasis on inflection in connected speech, and the partitive article.
